title: Project-Based Foreign Language Vocabulary Learning Video Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Office/administrative professionals aiming to enhance real-life language application abilities through work-integrated project execution.

learning_goals: Recall over 80% of 30 target vocabulary items accurately after watching a 10-minute educational video
Apply learned vocabulary to project scenarios with over 70% accuracy using interactive elements in videos
Evaluate social presence and cognitive load levels at 3.5 or higher on a 5-point Likert scale after watching learning videos
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
